definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: ornament, deck oneself (Aram. in deriv. [[עִידּוּת]], ornament; cf. perh. [[עֲדִיתָא]], scurf, scab; Ar. 9adway mange, scab, etc. [as sheathing, or excrescence ?], also 9idany, broad stone for covering grave, etc., Lane:1979);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 2 fs. [[וְעָדִית]] Ez Eze 23:40; Impf. 3 fs. [[תַּעְדֶּה]] Is 61:10, [[וַתַּ֫עַד]] Ho 2:15; 2 fs. [[תַּעְדִּי]] Je 4:30, Je 31:4, [[וַתַּעְדִּי]] Ez Eze 16:13; 1 S. sf. [[וׇאֶעְדֵךְ]] v:Eze 16:11; Imv. ms. [[עֲדֵה־נׇא]] Job 40:10; —ornament; usu.

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: reflex., deck oneself with, c. acc. of (woman's) ornaments, of bride Is 61:10 (sim.; cf. [[הִלְבִּישׁ]] va); fig. of Isr. Ho 2:15, Je 31:4; Jerus. Je 4:30 (c. acc. cogn,; ‖[[לָבַשׁ]]), Ez Eze 16:13 ([[מַלְבּוּשֵׁךְ]] in ‖ clause), Eze 23:40 (c. acc. cogn.).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: metaph., [[עֲדֵה־נׇא גׇאוֹן וגוי]] Job 40:10 deck now thyself [Job] with majesty.
c. 2. acc., [[וׇאֶעְדֵךְ עֶָדִי]] Ez Eze 16:11 and I decked thee [Jerus.] with finery (? rd.
